company_context: Ansible Collaborative Documentation Project documentation Ansible Automation Platform documentation Galaxy Forum Resources How Ansible works Ansible ecosystem Frequently asked questions Events Ansible community training Contact us Ansible Automation Platform Ansible Collaborative A gathering space to build automation skills and success Welcome to the Ansible® Collaborative, a destination for Ansible users, customers, partners, and vendors to learn and share automation content. Join the Ansible forum Looking for the enterprise product? Learn about Red Hat® Ansible Automation Platform. Icon-Red_Hat-Directional-A-Black-RGB What is Ansible? No matter your role, or your automation goals, Ansible can help you connect teams and deliver efficiencies. Ansible is an open source IT automation engine that automates provisioning, configuration management, application deployment, orchestration, and many other IT processes. It is free to use, and the project benefits from the experience and intelligence of its thousands of contributors. Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform combines more than a dozen upstream projects into a unified, security-hardened enterprise platform for mission-critical automation. It builds on the foundation of the open source project to create an end-to-end automation experience for cross-functional teams. How Ansible works Automate Policy as Code for consistency and compliance Ansible’s automated Policy as Code capabilities will help you automate compliance and policy enforcement across the full operational life cycle that now includes AI—from creating automation to managing IT processes at scale. Join the Ansible Policy as Code advocacy group to learn best practices, share your ideas with others, and help to shape this technology as it develops. Customers Partners Learn Ansible skills Documentation Introduction to Ansible Start automating with Ansible Create a playbook Explore Ansible concepts Build an inventory Interactive labs Writing first Ansible playbook Intro to Ansible automation controller Get started with ansible-navigator Get started with ansible-builder Get started with Event-Driven Ansible and Ansible rulebooks Explore Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform learning materials and tools Ready to move from patchwork to platform? You already know the benefits of upstream Ansible tools. But if your organization is ready to take automation to the next level, it's time to consider Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform. It delivers more capabilities-like event-driven automation and generative AI-that reduce manual effort and increase efficiency, as well as enhanced security and end-to-end technical support. Get the details Ansible collections With Ansible Galaxy, you can jump-start your automation with pre-packaged roles and collections. Use this content in Ansible Playbooks to automate your work faster and improve productivity. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their IT operations and gain valuable insights from their data. I came across your company and saw that you're using Ansible for automation. Can you tell me a little bit about your current setup and how you're using Ansible?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (sighs) Yeah, we're using Ansible for automating some of our IT processes. But to be honest, we're not really looking for any new solutions right now. We've got our hands full just trying to keep up with our current workload. What makes you think we need your product?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand that you're busy, but that's exactly why I think DeepData AI could be a good fit for you. Our solution can help you automate even more of your processes and free up your team to focus on higher-level tasks. Plus, our AI-powered engine can help you identify areas of inefficiency and optimize your workflows. We've had success with other companies in the industry who were using Ansible, and I think we could do the same for you. Would you be open to a quick demo to see how it works?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) I'm not sure...I mean, we've already got a pretty robust automation setup with Ansible. What could your product possibly do that Ansible can't? And how much is this going to cost us? We're not looking to break the bank on some new fancy solution that may or may not work.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a fair question. While Ansible is great for automation, it's not necessarily designed for complex data processing and analysis. That's where DeepData AI comes in. Our solution can take the data that Ansible is generating and help you make sense of it, identifying trends and patterns that can inform your business decisions. As for cost, we offer a tiered pricing model that's based on the size of your organization and the scope of your project. I'd be happy to provide you with a custom quote if you're interested. But I want to assure you that we've worked with companies of all sizes and have a proven track record of ROI.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (still skeptical) Okay, fine. I'll take a look at your demo. But like I said, we're not looking to spend a lot of money right now. And I'm going to need to see some pretty compelling evidence that your product is worth the investment. Can you send me a link to the demo or schedule a time to walk me through it? And can you also provide some case studies or references from other companies in our industry?
